Title: The Mechanic
Plot: Arthur Bishop (Jason Statham) is a 'mechanic' - an elite assassin with a strict code and unique talent for cleanly eliminating targets. It's a job that requires professional perfection and total detachment, and Bishop is the best in the business. But when his mentor and close friend Harry (Donald Sutherland) is murdered, Bishop is anything but detached. His next assignment is self-imposed - he wants those responsible dead. His mission grows complicated when Harry's son Steve (Ben Foster) approaches him with the same vengeful goal and a determination to learn Bishop's trade. Bishop has always acted alone but he can't turn his back on Harry's son. A methodical hit man takes an impulsive student deep into his world and a deadly partnership is born. But while in pursuit of their ultimate mark, deceptions threaten to surface and those hired to fix problems become problems themselves.
Stars: Jason Statham, Ben Foster, Donald Sutherland, Tony Goldwyn
Companies: CBS Films, Millennium Films, Chartoff-Winkler Productions
Tagline: The most powerful criminals believe they're untouchable. They're dead wrong.
Keywords: sex scene,woman on top,female rear nudity,apprentice,assassin

Similars.Title: Mechanic: Resurrection
Similars.Plot: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Jessica Alba, Tommy Lee Jones

Similars.Title: The Transporter
Similars.Plot: Frank Martin, who "transports" packages for unknown clients, is asked to move a package that soon begins moving, and complications arise.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Qi Shu, Matt Schulze

Similars.Title: Transporter 3
Similars.Plot: Frank Martin is forced to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukrainian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova

Similars.Title: Transporter 2
Similars.Plot: Transporter Frank Martin, surfaces in Miami, Florida and is implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Amber Valletta, Kate Nauta

Similars.Title: Crank
Similars.Plot: Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Amy Smart, Carlos Sanz

Similars.Title: Safe
Similars.Plot: Mei, a young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued by the Triads, the Russian mob, and corrupt NYC cops. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Catherine Chan, Chris Sarandon

Similars.Title: Parker
Similars.Plot: A thief with a unique code of professional ethics is double-crossed by his crew and left for dead. Assuming a new disguise and forming an unlikely alliance with a woman on the inside, he looks to hijack the score of the crew's latest heist.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Jennifer Lopez, Michael Chiklis

Similars.Title: Crank: High Voltage
Similars.Plot: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Amy Smart, Clifton Collins Jr.

Similars.Title: Blitz
Similars.Plot: A tough cop is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Paddy Considine, Aidan Gillen

Similars.Title: Death Race
Similars.Plot: Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Joan Allen, Tyrese Gibson

Similars.Title: Killer Elite
Similars.Plot: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for the death of his sons.
Similars.Stars: Jason Statham, Clive Owen, Robert De Niro

Similars.Title: The Expendables
Similars.Plot: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.
Similars.Stars: Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham, Jet Li
